title: 11/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 11/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to former NFL QB and NBC Football analyst Drew Brees about Justin Herbert. What does Brees think Herbert's long term success in the NFL will be? Washington Football Team Head Coach Ron Rivera tells us why he's in favor of the taunting rules. And Carson Palmer teaches DP a trendy football word

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to former NFL QB and NBC Football analyst Drew Brees about Justin Herbert. What does Brees think Herbert's long term success in the NFL will be? Washington Football Team Head Coach Ron Rivera tells us why he's in favor of the taunting rules. And Carson Palmer teaches DP a trendy football word
